metadata.Title: CVE-2020-6095 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An exploitable denial of service vulnerability exists in the GstRTSPAuth functionality of GStreamer/gst-rtsp-server 1.14.5. A specially crafted RTSP setup request can cause a null pointer deference resulting in denial-of-service. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: gst-rtsp-server1.0 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
